analysis.analysis: NPC (Non-Player Character) livestreams have emerged as a unique form of entertainment where people role-play as AI-controlled characters found in video games. These streams often feature performers who aim to mimic the behavior and dialogue of NPCs, creating an immersive and humorous experience for viewers.
analysis.meme: Become the NPC you were born to be! Let the algorithms guide your every move, while the internet watches in amusement.
